comments.body:
Test a comment:
* After selecting my id, I need to refresh the screen to make it work.
* Nav bar links can't be opened by middle click/in a new tab.
* Hope there will be auto-index/header-index for every article, so reader don't need to scroll the whole article to find something s/he may be interested in.
* Would like that comment box is auto-expanded when typing.

Multiple string is not allowed. If you also want to ignore `.git`: `"ignore": "(data/users/.*|\.git)"`. There are some basic tutorials for regex [here](/DevCenter.bit/?/tutorials/static_zite). Also you can use https://regex101.com/ to test and learn regex.
